meanings.sent1: The highroad led us through the forest to the village.
meanings.sent2: She preferred taking the highroad as it was faster than the winding paths.
meanings.sent3: The highroad seemed to have a mind of its own, guiding travelers to their destinations.
meanings.sent4: In life, sometimes taking the highroad means facing challenges head-on.
meanings.sent5: The highroad stretched out before us, promising adventure and discovery.

meanings.definition: A course of action that is ethical or honorable.
meanings.sent1: Choosing the highroad may not always be easy, but it is the right thing to do.
meanings.sent2: He decided to take the highroad and admit his mistake to clear his conscience.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of temptation, she always stayed on the highroad.
meanings.sent4: Taking the highroad in tough situations can earn you respect and trust.
meanings.sent5: Walking the highroad of integrity will always lead to a sense of pride and self-worth.
